TypeSignature.Value: public delegate bool UIDocumentInteractionProbe(UIDocumentInteractionController controller, Selector action);
.class public auto ansi sealed UIDocumentInteractionProbe extends System.MulticastDelegate
type UIDocumentInteractionProbe = delegate of UIDocumentInteractionController * Selector -> bool

Docs.param: The action that is being probed.
Docs.summary: A delegate signature for determining whether a document operation should take place.
Docs.returns: Whether the action should take place or not.
Docs.remarks: Used by the UIDocumentInteractionController for the CanPerformAction and PerformAction hooks.
